ValidationRule.description: User will not able to close a case without entering the resolution field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name ='Repair & Overhaul' , ISBLANK( Resolution__c ) , OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Expired') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Completed') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed/Collected') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed with Credit') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Approved') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Denied') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Partially Accepted') ) ) &&($Profile.Name != 'System Administrator') &&($Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)') && ($Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)') && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Enter the Resolution before closing the Case
